#
# Project variables:
#  OCL_SOURCE_DIR    - points to the top src directory
#  OCL_BINARY_DIR    - points to the directory outside of OCL_SOURCE_DIR - root of generated files
#

# set that name of the main output file as a target name
set( TARGET_NAME protobuf )

include (../CMakeFuncs.txt)

include_directories( . include src )

if (WIN32)
  add_definitions( -D_SCL_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS )
else (WIN32)
  remove_definitions( -Werror -pedantic )
  add_definitions ( -DHAVE_PTHREAD )
endif (WIN32)

FIND_SOURCES_RECURSE()
CALCULATE_TARGET_SOURCES()

SET_UNICODE_ON()

# add a target named ${TARGET_NAME}
add_library (${TARGET_NAME} STATIC ${TARGET_SOURCES})

# Disable MSVC warnings generated by the protobuf source code
# These are taken from protobuf's own MSVC project
if (MSVC)
  set( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}" " /wd4244 /wd4267 /wd4018 /wd4355 /wd4800 /wd4251 /wd4996 /wd4146 /wd4305")
endif(MSVC)
